Posts.Content: Whyus2018 wrote: I was wondering if there are any newly diagnosed on Verzenio and Letrozole. I see a lot on Ibrance but no one on Verzenio. Am I alone? I have my first scan in two weeks and see many having success on Ibrance. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Verzenio vs Ibrance Whyus2018 pajim

Posts.Content: Oct 11, 2018 11:40AM Whyus2018 wrote: Thanks for the info. I was on Verzenio 150 and had horrible diarrhea and a body rash. MO lowered to 100 mg Still with Letrozole and so far tolerable. I have my first scan in a week to see how it has worked. Still the occasional diarrhea problem but Imodium helps me. I also found drinking tons of water helps.
